attributes.action: Enforce the Carriage by Air Act 2002 by forcing travel insurance companies to treat two flights as a single journey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under the Carriage by Air act 2002 a journey which consists of two flights is classed as a single journey. Travel insurance companies sell policies which only cover one flight. This should be illegal under the Unfair Terms in Consumer Contracts Regulations 1999. They should cover every flight in a journey.
